answers.answer: Hello,This burning of urethra can be due to urethritis or due to parasthesia skin. Get a urethral swab and get other medical conditions like diabetes, hypothyroidism, and hypoparathyroidism ruled out. They can also be due to peripheral vascular disease, vitamin B12 deficiency or malnutrition.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your dermatologist. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: Hi guys,i have exactly the same symtoms about three monts now, did every kind of tests turning out nothing...i see the discussion is from 2007, can somebody advise me what to do, it seem that no atibiotics works for this kind of desease...please let me know i will be very thankfulThis discussion is related to/posts/show/240788.
title: Burning Urethra and testis
